title: Cold water currently slowing fastest Greenland glacier

title_detail.value: Cold water currently slowing fastest Greenland glacier

summary: NASA research shows that Jakobshavn Glacier, which has been Greenland's fastest-flowing and fastest-thinning glacier for the last 20 years, has made an unexpected about-face. The glacier is still adding to global sea level rise, but at a slower rate.
